General.Name: Y-Entec Co. Ltd
General.Description: Y-Entec Co., Ltd. focuses on the recycling and disposal of industrial waste in South Korea. The company is also involved in the construction of earthworks, and reinforced concrete and pavement projects; shipping businesses; and operation of golf courses. In addition, it manufactures and sells remicon. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Yeosu, South Korea.
